body: I suspect this will be fixed by higher-rank trait lifetimes being implemented.

I'm getting this, too. Here's a backtrace and more complete context if it helps.

https://github.com/cybergeek94/multipart/blob/unboxed_closure_ice/src/server.rs#L87

`MultipartField<'a>` is marked with `ContravariantLifetime<'a>`, if that makes a difference. This seems to be blocking any code that has unboxed closures interacting with lifetimes.


@pythonesque example works now that HRTB (#18993) has landed.
Can't test my case yet since some of my dependencies are still broken by the chages to enum variant namespacing. Hopefully those get fixed soon.
